item.title: I do not think Dawkin's ever makes a claim about t...
item.description: I do not think Dawkin's ever makes a claim about the superiority of atheism, in terms of being a 'better person'. He only claims organised religions can be detrimental to society but also freely admits people like Stalin\Hitler, alleged Atheists (debatable), didn't necessarily have religious incentives for their attrocities â€¦
